tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE whitewater_rafting_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(50),
    difficulty_level VARCHAR(20),
    distance_km DECIMAL,
    safety_procedure TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    difficulty_level INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name TEXT,
  difficulty_level TEXT,
  distance FLOAT,
  duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE trip_details (
  trip_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  trip_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  procedure_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (procedure_id) REFERENCES safety_procedures(procedure_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
    trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_name VARCHAR(50),
    trip_date DATE,
    trip_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE guides (
    guide_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guide_name VARCHAR(50),
    guide_experience INT,
    guide_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE rapids (
    rapid_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rapid_name VARCHAR(50),
    rapid_difficulty VARCHAR(20),
    rapid_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE safety_procedures (
    procedure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_name VARCHAR(50),
    procedure_description TEXT,
    procedure_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE trip_logs (
  trip_id INT,
  date DATE,
  route_id INT,
  guide_id INT,
  raft_id INT
);
